def has_power_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    # Function to determine if the coffee maker can be powered on
    symbol has_power=plugged(coffee_maker) and has_switch(coffee_maker)
    return has_power

def has_water(coffee_maker:item):
    # Function to check if the coffee maker has water
    return has_water(coffee_maker)

behavior initiate_brew_coffee(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        if has_power_coffee_maker(coffee_maker):
            achieve_once is_on(coffee_maker)
            achieve has_water(coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        
        initiate_brew_coffee(coffee_maker)

    symbol ready=has_water(coffee_maker) and is_on(coffee_maker)

behavior verify_coffee_maker_setup(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        if not visited(coffee_maker):
            observe(coffee_maker, "Check if the coffee maker has water and is plugged in")

behavior brew_coffee(coffee_maker:item):

            brew_coffee(coffee_maker)

    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker) and id[coffee_maker]==290

        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, coffee_maker)

        achieve open(coffee_maker)

        achieve_once is_on(faucet)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Brew a cup of coffee using the coffee maker.', '2. Add milk and sugar to the brewed coffee.']

def observe_has_water(coffee_maker:item):
    symbol has_water=exists water: item : has_water(water) and inside(water, coffee_maker)
    return has_water

behavior open_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        achieve open(coffee_maker) 

behavior fill_water(coffee_maker:item, faucet:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, faucet)
        achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        achieve_once is_on(faucet)
        achieve has_water(coffee_maker)
        achieve_once is_off(faucet)

behavior brew_coffee(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        achieve plugged(coffee_maker)
        achieve_once is_on(coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker) and inside_char(char, coffee_maker)
        if not open(coffee_maker):
            open_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)
        
        if not observe_has_water(coffee_maker):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, coffee_maker)
            fill_water(coffee_maker, faucet)

        if not is_on(coffee_maker):
            brew_coffee(coffee_maker)

def has_water_in_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    # Function to check if the coffee maker has water
    symbol has_water=exists water:item : has_water(water) and inside(water, coffee_maker)
    return has_water

behavior fill_coffee_maker_with_water(coffee_maker:item, faucet:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, faucet)
        # Move close to the faucet
        achieve_once has_water(coffee_maker)
        # Temporarily ensure water is added to the coffee maker

behavior start_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(coffee_maker)
        # Ensure the coffee maker is turned on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker) and plugged(coffee_maker)
        # Select a coffee maker that is plugged in
        if not has_water_in_coffee_maker(coffee_maker):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, coffee_maker)
            fill_coffee_maker_with_water(coffee_maker, faucet)
            # Fill the coffee maker with water

        start_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Turn on the coffee maker to brew the coffee
